title: BHEL gets 2,400 MW greenfield power project from NLC India in Odisha
description: The scope of the EPC contract includes engineering, manufacturing, supply, erection, and commissioning of crucial equipment, such as boilers, turbines, generators, and other auxiliary systems, for the 3x800 MW thermal power project.
